BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DHL (dříve PPL Sprint) 290 Kč s DPH; DHL Výnos do patra 390 Kč s DPH; DHL Nadrozměr 139 Kč s DPH; Prémiová doprava inSPORTline: 0 Kč / 1990 Kč / 2490 Kč / 2990 Kč / 3490 Kč dle vybraného produktu

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers a wide range of delivery methods, including standard Home Delivery, specialized Bulky Product Home Delivery, Parcel Shops/Lockers, and In-Store Pickup.
PROVIDERS: Key providers are PPL, DHL, GLS, DPD, Česká pošta, and Zásilkovna. The store also offers its own 'Prémiová doprava inSPORTline' for select items.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs range from 89 Kč to 119 Kč. Parcel shop/locker delivery is priced between 59 Kč and 63 Kč. Bulky item delivery ranges from 139 Kč to 390 Kč, with premium services costing up to 3490 Kč. In-store pickup is 29 Kč in major cities and free in Vítkov. A flat COD surcharge of 30 Kč applies to most delivery services.
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe for all methods is up to 5 business days.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store provides specialized delivery services for heavy and oversized items, such as 'DHL Výnos do patra' (delivery to a specific floor with customer assistance) and 'Prémiová doprava inSPORTline', which can include assembly. There is no mention of free shipping thresholds or express/weekend delivery options.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: All shipping information is comprehensively detailed within section 6 of the Terms and Conditions page. While the information is clear and covers various scenarios, its placement within a legal document rather than a dedicated, easily accessible 'Shipping' page might make it harder for some users to find.
